attachments.text:
This channel has its own private Google Drive folder.

Only members of the channel can view its contents.

Invite other members into this channel to give them access!

*DO NOT SHARE FILES BY LINK IN THIS FOLDER!*

Type `%s drive` to view this message again.

error.text: :thinking_face: Hmm, I don't know that command...

help.text: Use /%s to connect to this channel's Google Drive folder

attachments.text: Get a link to the Google Drive folder:```/%s drive```Show this message:```/%s help```Get access to this channel's Google Drive folder:```/%s login```

login.text: :mantelpiece_clock: Hold on while I talk to Google Drive...
